description: Objective: Introduce students to the concept of money and its importance in our daily lives.
subtitle: Introduction to Money
title: Lesson 1

description: Objective: Teach students to recognize and distinguish between different coins and bills.
subtitle: Identifying Coins and Bills
title: Lesson 2

description: Objective: Teach students how to count coins and bills.
subtitle: Counting Money
title: Lesson 3

description: Objective: Concept of saving money and its significance in achieving future goals.
subtitle: Saving Money
title: Lesson 4

description: Objective: Teach students how to make smart decisions when spending money.
subtitle: Spending Money Wisely
title: Lesson 5

description: Explains the concept of earning money and its significance in our lives.
subtitle: Earning Money
title: Lesson 6

description: Objective: Teach students about the importance of giving back and helping others.
subtitle: Giving Back
title: Lesson 7

description: Objective: Help students distinguish between needs and wants to make better financial decisions.
subtitle: Understanding Needs and Wants
title: Lesson 8

description: Objective: Introduce students to the concept of budgeting and how to manage money responsibly.
subtitle: Budgeting Basics
title: Lesson 9

description: Objective: Teach students how to set realistic financial goals and work towards achieving them.
subtitle: Setting Financial Goals
title: Lesson 10
